inspectButton
format:
<template>
    <v-btn class="vibrationPlusInspectButton" @click="send({payload:true})" color="#021c35" density="default" append-icon="mdi-code-braces"> Inspect </v-btn>
</template>

<style>
.vibrationPlusInspectButton{
    height: 10px !important;
    border-radius: 15px !important;
    top: -96px !important;
    left: -155px !important;
    width: 142px !important;
}
</style>

name: initShow
func:
let unit = {
    groups: 
    { 
        hide: 
        [
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusInspect1",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusInspect2",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusInspect3"
        ],
        show:
        [
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusSelectMAC",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusDownload",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusODR",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusTemperature",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusBattery",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusACCGroup_x",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusVelDisplGroup_x",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusOneTwoThreeGroup_x",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusACCGroup_y",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusVelDisplGroup_y",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusOneTwoThreeGroup_y",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusACCGroup_z",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusVelDisplGroup_z",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusOneTwoThreeGroup_z"
        ],
        enable:
        [
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusSelectMAC",
            "ncd-vibration-plus:vibrationPlusDownload"
        ]
    } 
}
msg.payload = unit;
return msg;
